goals.active: Acquire Councillor Flax's crozier as the power source for your Infinity Ball.
goals.complete: I employed some quick thinking and some serious fast-talking to convince Councillor Flax's people to hand over his crozier. Now that we have the power source we need, Shodd and I are ready to take the final step and make the Infinity Ball work the way I always intended it to work: perfectly. I just hope Zojja will be more impressed than angry.
